channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ruben Gallego makes Iowa swing to boost Democrats, adding to 2028 buzz
item.description: The first-term senator from Arizona crisscrossed the red state, holding a town hall, visiting the Iowa State Fair and making other stops, aiming to of...

item.title: Redistricting battle underscores an age of partisan divisiveness
item.description: The corrosive forces that brought the nation’s politics to this point long predated Donald Trump.

item.title: Democrats eyeing 2028 aim to show they’re unafraid of enemy turf
item.description: Some presidential prospects have embraced “Sister Souljah moments” that demonstrate their independence from left-wing orthodoxy.

item.title: A review process exists for Trump’s White House ballroom. He hasn’t applied yet.
item.description: The National Capital Planning Commission has taken years to approve much smaller White House projects than a ballroom planned by President Trump.

item.title: "Watts Rebellion" 60th anniversary renews call for Kerner Report plan to fight poverty
item.description: The 60th anniversary of a shocking uprising in Los Angeles, which foretold similar unrest in cities throughout the 1960s and 1970s , is being marked w...

item.title: Sin city economic slump signals wider slowdown
item.description: Tourism is down by roughly 11% in Las Vegas this year, with visitor numbers, convention attendance and hotel occupancy all lower than usual, according...

item.title: Vance's U.K. talks yield "significant progress" ahead of Trump-Putin summit: Source
item.description: Vice President JD Vance 's hours-long meetings on Saturday in the UK produced "significant progress" toward President Trump's goal of ending the war i...

item.title: Lawmakers urge Meta to shut down Instagram Map: "abysmal" at protecting children
item.description: Democratic and Republican lawmakers are urging Mark Zuckerberg's Meta to shut down Instagram's new map feature, calling it a risk to child safety. The...

item.title: Gold plaque, Olympic medals and a jet: Here are the gifts Trump has accepted
item.description: Donald Trump received a glass disc with a 24-karat gold base from Apple CEO Tim Cook on Wednesday, as the tech titan announced a $100 billion investme...

item.title: Laura Loomer knocks Medal of Honor recipient in new attack on Army
item.description: An unofficial adviser to President Trump, Loomer chastised Army Secretary Dan Driscoll over a social media post recognizing the combat actions of Flor...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Trump is under water on some of his top issues — including immigration, poll shows
item.description: The president’s approval rating had been ticking upward since its biggest drop in April.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
